panel_embed_data.content:
🏰 **Welcome to Our Clan Recruitment Portal** 🏰

Ready to join one of the most active and successful clans? Apply now!

embeds.title: ⚔️ Elite Warriors Clan - Recruitment Open! ⚔️
embeds.description:
**Are you ready to join the elite?**

We're looking for dedicated players who are passionate about Clash of Clans and ready to contribute to our clan's success!

🏆 **What we offer:**
• Active donations 24/7
• Max clan games rewards
• Competitive war environment
• Friendly and supportive community
• Expert attack strategies and coaching

📋 **Requirements:**
• Town Hall 12+ with decent heroes
• Active daily player
• Must participate in clan wars
• Respectful and team-oriented
• English speaking

💎 **Clan Stats:**
• Level: 15+
• War Win Rate: 85%+
• Location: International
• Members: 45/50

**Ready to apply? Click the button below and have your player tag ready!**

footer.text: Make sure you meet our requirements before applying! • Applications reviewed within 24h

welcome_embed_data.content:
🎉 **Welcome to Elite Warriors!** 🎉

Thank you for your interest in joining our amazing clan family!

embeds.title: 🏰 Application Submitted Successfully!
embeds.description:
**Greetings, future warrior!**

Your clan application has been received and our recruitment team will review it shortly. We're excited to potentially welcome you to our clan family!

📋 **What happens next?**
• Our staff will review your player profile
• We may ask additional questions about your playstyle
• You'll receive a decision within 24 hours
• If accepted, you'll get an invite to our clan

🔍 **During the review process:**
• Please keep your player profile public
• Stay active in-game
• Feel free to ask any questions here
• Our staff may provide feedback or suggestions

⏰ **Response Time:** Usually within 2-12 hours
📱 **Questions?** Our staff team is here to help!

**Good luck with your application!** 🍀

footer.text: Elite Warriors Clan • Est. 2020 • Thanks for choosing us!

fields.name: 📞 Need Help?
fields.value: Tag our staff members or ask questions here

fields.name: ⭐ Pro Tip
fields.value: Keep your base and troops upgraded while we review!
